summary: Set in an era where superheroes are commonly known and accepted, young William Stronghold, the son of the Commander and Jetstream, tries to find a balance between being a normal teenager and an extraordinary being.
cast: Michael Angarano|Kurt Russell|Kelly Preston|Danielle Panabaker|Christopher Wynne|Kevin Heffernan|Dee Jay Daniels|Kelly Vitz|Loren Berman|Nicholas Braun|Malika Haqq|Khadijah Haqq|Jake Sandvig|Will Harris|Mary Elizabeth Winstead|Lynda Carter|Bruce Campbell|Dustin Ingram|Steven Strait|Cloris Leachman|Jim Rash|Dave Foley|Kevin McDonald|Amy Brown|Kimmy Brown|Lucille Soong|Zachry Rogers|Tom Kenny|Jill Talley|Patrick Warburton|Vakisha Coleman|Sean Gordon|Hans Hernke|Katrina-Jovan Howard|Nicole Malgarini|Jason Maxim|Robert McMurrer
keywords: coming of age|non comic book superhero|superheroine|teen movie|male protagonist
title: Sky High: Una escuela de altos vuelos
